alfredsnippet.snippet:
"Massive computer simulations will enhance our understanding and intuition of how galaxies, stars, and planets form ... Dramatic advances in computer technology will allow virtual-reality experiments on stellar collisions, black holes, and other phenomena."

- Martin Rees, Our Cosmic Habitat (2001) p.136
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Martin Rees Thinks that Big Simulations Will Lead the Way
